alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 31 at 1:01PM MST until January 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SATURDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures around 30 expected. * WHERE...Superior, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon and Dripping Springs. * WHEN...From midnight Saturday night to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Superior
